mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT E.EMP_NO, M.MEM_NAME, C.CODE_NAME, E.EMP_DEPARTMENT FROM EMP E JOIN member m ON e.mem_no = m.mem_no INNER JOIN CLINIC CN ON CN.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON C.CODE_NO = CN.CLINIC_NO LEFT JOIN calendar c ON c.emp_no = e.emp_no AND c.calendar_title = '연가' AND #{date} BETWEEN c.CALENDAR_STARTDATE AND c.CALENDAR_ENDDATE WHERE c.emp_no IS NULL and m.emp_job='의사'
select mem_name from member where mem_no = #{memNo}
select mem_tel from member where mem_no = #{memNo}
select m.mem_name from member m, emp e where m.mem_no = e.mem_no and e.emp_no = #{empNo}
